summary: Two Argentine sisters, Memé and Aneta, lose their mother in a car crash. Memé, the elder, is also left lame with one badly scarred leg. The orphaned girls go to Uruguay to stay with their ... See full summary »
cast: Ingrid Rubio|Jimena Barón|Florencia Bertotti|Ricardo Darín|Norberto Díaz|Mariano Martínez|Norma Aleandro|Roberto Vallejos|Ina Casares|Carmen Renard|Mónica Lacoste|Mariano Bertolini|Jorge Marrale|Elcira Olivera Garcés|Florencia Carrillo|Ana María Sarro|Boy Olmi|Paola Krum|Federico Desseno|Ricardo Passano|Oscar Ferrigno Jr.|Carlos Gentile|Fernanda Nucci|Juan Ponce de León|Rene Carbello|Elke Orlob|Sara Bessio|Ulises Di Roma|Gabriel Germelli|Daniel Devesa|Patricia Camponovo|Francisco Benitez|Juan Santin|Matías Sciutto|Carmen del Pino
title: El faro del sur
